00066 class YATE_API XmlSaxParser : public DebugEnabler
00067 {
00068 public:
00069     enum Error {
00070         NoError = 0,
00071         NotWellFormed,
00072         Unknown,
00073         IOError,
00074         ElementParse,
00075         ReadElementName,
00076         InvalidElementName,
00077         ReadingAttributes,
00078         CommentParse,
00079         DeclarationParse,
00080         DefinitionParse,
00081         CDataParse,
00082         ReadingEndTag,
00083         Incomplete,
00084         InvalidEncoding,
00085         UnsupportedEncoding,
00086         UnsupportedVersion,
00087     };
00088     enum Type {
00089         None           = 0,
00090         Text           = 1,
00091         CData          = 2,
00092         Element        = 3,
00093         Doctype        = 4,
00094         Comment        = 5,
00095         Declaration    = 6,
00096         Instruction    = 7,
00097         EndTag         = 8,
00098         Special        = 9
00099     };

00504 class YATE_API XmlParent
00505 {
00506 public:
00510     XmlParent()
00511         { }
00512

00517         { }
00518 
00524     virtual XmlDocument* document()
00525         { return 0; }
00526 
00532     virtual XmlFragment* fragment()
00533         { return 0; }
00534 
00540     virtual XmlElement* element()
00541         { return 0; }
00542 
00548     virtual XmlSaxParser::Error addChild(XmlChild* child) = 0;
00549 
00555     inline XmlChild* addChildSafe(XmlChild* child) {
00556             XmlSaxParser::Error err = addChild(child);
00557             if (err != XmlSaxParser::NoError)
00558                 TelEngine::destruct(child);
00559             return child;
00560         }
00561 
00568     virtual XmlChild* removeChild(XmlChild* child, bool delObj = true) = 0;
00569 
00574     virtual void reset()
00575         { }
00576 
00582     virtual const ObjList& getChildren() const
00583         { return ObjList::empty(); }
00584 
00589     virtual void clearChildren()
00590         {  }
00591 
00596     inline bool hasChildren() const
00597         { return getChildren().skipNull() != 0; }
00598 };

01005     inline XmlElement* takeRoot(bool completed = false)
01006     {
01007         XmlElement* r = root(completed);
01008         if (r)
01009             m_root = 0;
01010         return r;
01011     }
01012 
01016     virtual void reset();
01017 
01024     virtual XmlChild* removeChild(XmlChild* child, bool delObj = true)
01025         { return m_beforeRoot.removeChild(child,delObj); }

01034

01049         bool completeOnly = true) const;

01059 
01069     int saveFile(const char* file = 0, bool escape = true,
01070         const String& indent = String::empty(), bool completeOnly = true) const;
01071 
01079     void toString(String& dump, bool escape = true, const String& indent = String::empty(),
01080         const String& origIndent = String::empty()) const;
01081 
01082 private:
01083     XmlElement* m_root;                  // The root element
01084     XmlFragment m_beforeRoot;            // XML children before root (declaration ...)
01085     String m_file;                       // The file name used on load
01086     XmlFragment m_afterRoot;             // XML children after root (comments, empty text)

01289     inline XmlElement* pop() {
01290             XmlElement* x = findFirstChild();
01291             if (!(x && x->completed()))
01292                 return 0;
01293             m_children.removeChild(x,false);
01294             return x;
01295         }
01296

01302         { return m_element; }

01341     inline XmlElement* findFirstChild(const String& name, const String* ns = 0,
01342         bool noPrefix = true) const
01343         { return XmlFragment::findElement(getChildren().skipNull(),&name,ns,noPrefix); }
01344 
01355     inline XmlElement* findNextChild(const XmlElement* prev = 0, const String* name = 0,
01356         const String* ns = 0, bool noPrefix = true) const {
01357             if (!prev)
01358                 return findFirstChild(name,ns,noPrefix);
01359             ObjList* start = getChildren().find(prev);
01360             return start ? XmlFragment::findElement(start->skipNext(),name,ns,noPrefix) : 0;
01361         }
01362 
01373     inline XmlElement* findNextChild(const String& name, const XmlElement* prev = 0,
01374         const String* ns = 0, bool noPrefix = true) const
01375         { return findNextChild(prev,&name,ns,noPrefix); }
01376 
01386     inline const String* childText(const String& name, const String* ns = 0,
01387         bool noPrefix = true) const {
01388             XmlElement* c = findFirstChild(&name,ns,noPrefix);
01389             return c ? &(c->getText()) : 0;
01390         }

01447     inline void setAttribute(const String& name, const char* value)
01448         { m_element.setParam(name,value); }
01449 
01455     inline void setAttributeValid(const String& name, const char* value) {
01456             if (!TelEngine::null(value))
01457                 m_element.setParam(name,value);
01458             else
01459                 removeAttribute(name);
01460         }
01461 
01467     inline const char* attribute(const String& name) const
01468         { return m_element.getValue(name); }
01469 
01475     inline String* getAttribute(const String& name) const
01476         { return m_element.getParam(name); }
01477 
01484     inline bool hasAttribute(const String& name, const String& value) const {
01485             String* a = getAttribute(name);
01486             return a && *a == value;
01487         }
01488 
01493     inline void removeAttribute(const String& name)
01494         { m_element.clearParam(name); }
01495 
01500     inline String* xmlns() const {
01501             if (!m_prefixed)
01502                 return xmlnsAttribute(s_ns);
01503             return xmlnsAttribute(s_nsPrefix + *m_prefixed);
01504         }
01505 
01510     String* xmlnsAttribute(const String& name) const;
01511 
01517     inline bool hasXmlns(const String& ns) const {
01518             const String* x = xmlns();
01519             return x && *x == ns;
01520         }
01521 
01530     bool setXmlns(const String& name = String::empty(), bool addAttr = false,
01531         const String& value = String::empty());
01532 
01539     static inline bool isXmlns(const String& str)
01540         { return str == s_ns || str.startsWith(s_nsPrefix); }
01541 
01558     static XmlElement* param2xml(NamedString* param, const String& tag,
01559         bool copyXml = false);
01560 
01570     static NamedString* xml2param(XmlElement* xml, const String* tag,
01571         bool copyXml = false);
01572 
01583     static void xml2param(NamedList& list, XmlElement* parent, const String* tag,
01584         bool copyXml = false);
01585 
01589     static const String s_ns;
01590 
01594     static const String s_nsPrefix;
01595 
01596 private:
01597     // Set prefixed data (tag and prefix)
01598     inline void setPrefixed() {
01599             TelEngine::destruct(m_prefixed);
01600             int pos = m_element.find(":");
01601             if (pos != -1)
01602                 m_prefixed = new NamedString(m_element.substr(pos + 1),m_element.substr(0,pos));
01603         }
01604 
01605     XmlFragment m_children;                      // Children of this element
01606     NamedList m_element;                         // The element
01607     NamedString* m_prefixed;                     // Splitted prefixed tag (the value is the namespace prefix)
01608     XmlParent* m_parent;                         // The XmlElement who holds this element
01609     NamedList* m_inheritedNs;                    // Inherited namespaces (if parent is 0)
01610     bool m_empty;                                // True if this element does not have any children
01611     bool m_complete;                             // True if the end element tag war reported
01612 };
